title: I get reported for no reason.
body: Um, riot some people have been reporting me for absolutely no reason!! People have been reporting me for trying in normals but sometimes i end up feeding because i was lagging and people report me for other different reasons like me being toxic, pls riot !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UNBANNED ME

replies.body: If you received a ban that you think was unintentional due to false reports, submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
